Articles.Title: New Character Confirmed For 2024 Star Wars TV Show: What Their Name Reveals
Articles.Description: British actress Abigail Thorn has joined Star Wars, and her character's name - Ensign Eurus - may hint at the plot of a 2024 Star Wars Disney+ TV show
Articles.Content: Abigail Thorn is joining the cast of The Acolyte, an upcoming Star Wars Disney+ TV show set to release in 2024. The future of Star Wars lies in the past; specifically in the High Republic Era, which … [+2090 chars]
